name: Dropp Pay Tipping
author: Dropp

sections.description:
The most economical way to accept tips and donations

The Dropp Pay Tipping WordPress plugin from Dropp is the most economical way to accept tips, donations from your fans and visitors of your website or blog. Free to install. No monthly fees, no subscription fees, no hidden fees. Only low transaction fee. Visit Dropp for full details on the fees.

SIMPLE AND EASY SETUP

Simple and easy setup that you can complete in just a few minutes, in a few clicks. The Dropp Pay Tipping plugin comes with defaults for many settings and is ready to use out-of-the-box with just a few inputs from you. Just link it to your Dropp account by providing your Dropp Account ID and you are ready to accept payments. It also offers full flexibility for you to configure the widget and its look and feel to your liking.

TWO-IN-ONE PLUGIN

The plugin comes in 2 flavors- a donation/tipping style widget and a ‘Like’ button type. In both cases, you set the $ amounts. After installation, head to the Settings page to configure it.

The ‘Like’ button is a loaded ‘Like’ button that triggers a payment from your visitors when they click on it.

TO ADD

Just add the shortcode to any page, post or sidebar or footer to include the widget and start accepting donations.

ABOUT DROPP

Dropp is a micropayment platform specifically built to enable small value payments for the digital market. Small value payments using credit cards are expensive with hefty fees for transactions under $10. Dropp fees are low so that you can take payments at any price point.

The Dropp platform offers ultimate security to the consumers where they don’t have to share their credentials, name or their payment details to the website taking payments and the website operator does not have to accept any liability for processing payments.

To learn more about Dropp and the various benefit it offers, visit https://dropp.cc
sections.installation:
Installation is quick, simple and free.

Install from the WordPress plugin directory (Search for “Dropp Pay”) or manually upload the plugin zip file.

ONE-TIME SETUP

After you install and active the plugin, from left navigation menu, to go Dropp > Profile screen. Follow instructions on-screen and provide your Dropp account ID. If you don’t have an account with Dropp, you can sign up for free at https://merchant.portal.dropp.cc/register

You can configure and further customize the plugin in Dropp > Settings screen.

STEP BY STEP INSTRUCTIONS

Step by step, video instructions are available here: https://dropp.cc/wordpress/

TEST MODE

You can also enable ‘test mode’ in the Profile screen of the plugin to simulate test payments before you start accepting real payments.

SUPPORT AND SENDING LOGS TO DROPP

Contact Dropp support via https://dropp.cc if you need help.

If you need to send logs to Dropp:
– You can download logs by clicking the Download button in the Logs screen
– Review the contents of the downloaded log file. If you are okay sharing the log file, email it to Dropp.
– Email the logs to Dropp ONLY WHEN asked by a Dropp support person to the email address they provide, and always email ONLY to a dropp.cc email address.

Also, remember Dropp will never ask for your private key information. Don’t share this with anyone.
